segments.text: I have some great news ! I was able to switch to the night shift !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I knew everything would work out for you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got to meet the night Anger today too . We got along right from the start .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful ! Do you already have your work schedule ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not yet , I pick it up tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know what you will be doing yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'll be managing the guys on the dock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're so good with people . I think they will like you !
segments.speaker: S2
